DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research is to identify biological characteristics occurring in the initiation and progression of melanoma.
DOC.brief_title: Storage and Research Use of Human Bio-specimens From Melanoma Patients and Clinical Testing for Assignment of Treatment
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria Pathologicallyproven diagnosis of melanoma. Patient must have a test or procedure that has the potential to provide leftover tissue that can be banked for future research purposes OR the patient has already had a diagnostic or therapeutic procedure but who has not yet been approached to participate is also eligible. Exclusion criteria Any patient with significant contraindications to venipuncture (e.g., severe anemia) will be excluded from blood collection procedures. However, if the patient provides consent and a paraffinembedded block or 1015 unstained slides of their tissue diagnosis, they will not be excluded from this protocol. Any patient unable or unwilling to provide consent.
